summary.span: 当对 方法发出调用时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a call is made to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用方法以销毁线程时，公共语言运行时将引发。When a call is made to the method to destroy a thread, the common language runtime throws a . 是特殊异常可捕获，但它将自动被再次引发的末尾`catch`块。 is a special exception that can be caught, but it will automatically be raised again at the end of the `catch` block. 当引发此异常时，运行时执行所有`finally`块结束线程之前。When this exception is raised, the runtime executes all the `finally` blocks before ending the thread. 因为线程可以不受限制的计算`finally`块或调用来取消中止，存在是没有保证的线程将完全结束。Because the thread can do an unbounded computation in the `finally` blocks or call to cancel the abort, there is no guarantee that the thread will ever end. 如果你想要等待，直到中止的线程已结束，则可以调用方法。If you want to wait until the aborted thread has ended, you can call the method. 是一个阻塞调用不返回直到线程实际停止执行。 is a blocking call that does not return until the thread actually stops executing. > [!NOTE] > 当公共语言运行时 (CLR) 停止后台 threadsafter 托管可执行文件中的所有前台线程已都结束时，它不使用。When the common language runtime (CLR) stops background threadsafter all foreground threads in a managed executable have ended, it does not use . 因此，不能使用来检测何时正在由 CLR 终止后台线程。Therefore, you cannot use to detect when background threads are being terminated by the CLR. 使用 HRESULT COR_E_THREADABORTED，其值 0x80131530。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_THREADABORTED, which has the value 0x80131530. > [!NOTE] > 继承的值属性始终是`null`。The value of the inherited property is always `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示正在中止的线程。The following example demonstrates aborting a thread. 接收的线程`ThreadAbortException`使用方法来取消中止请求并继续执行。The thread that receives the `ThreadAbortException` uses the method to cancel the abort request and continue executing. Main ending. ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过指定此属性返回的对象`stateInfo`参数方法。The object returned by this property is specified through the `stateInfo` parameter of the method. 确切内容和此对象的用法是应用程序定义;它通常用于传达对正在中止的线程有意义的信息。The exact content and usage of this object is application defined; it is typically used to convey information that is meaningful to the thread being aborted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将信息传递给正在中止的线程。The following code example shows how to pass information to a thread that is being aborted.
